archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.5.7a: a) include coverage of legal, regulatory and contractual requirements (e.g. PCI DSS and the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR)); relevant information security-related standards (e.g. ISO/IEC 27001, CIS Controls V8, CSA Cloud Controls Matrix (CCM) or NIST Cybersecurity framework); and organisational policies, standards and procedures for information security
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
